((Ask who left Iron because I thought she could handle it better then anyone 
else. But don't worry I'm not coming back try to take the maximals over or 
something because personally I wouldn't lead any of the old or new maximals 
to cyber snake pit to kick there ass in. No offense but it make my point 
clear.))

::Liono::
"Everyone knows there part lets head"

::Void::
"I'll be in touch" as he opens the launch doors.

::Liono::
Liono powers up the ship and the Lion Assault 2 take to the sky heading 
strait up breeching earths atmoshpere. as Liono fires up the secondary 
Rockets."First stop the Ark."

::Void::
"Here are the security codes"

::Koj::
Koj looking at the darkness of space "Hey Liono remeber the time we stole 
the pred battle ship."

::Dark::
"Once a space pirate always a Space pirate even when your good your still 
bad." As he try not reveal his sickness

::Liono::
Liono Sighs "Yeah why do you alway bring that up! We flew it into the Seven 
Lasers over cybertron to defuse the hostage problem."

::Koj::
"We you mean you! You blew up a building to rescue one person whose ransom 
was less than cost of damage you caused."

::Liono::
"You remeber all the trouble we got in!" liono laughs rough but never the 
less a Laugh

::Koj::
"We were about to drummed out of squad until your Hot Rod saved us." Grins

::Lion Assault 2::
As it reaches the moon transmits the defense codes and activates the Ark. 
The Lion Assault's Two Clawed arms roll forward and grabs the Ark as the 
Liono Assault 2 stabilzes it connects to the Ark.

::Koj,Dark,Liono::
All 3 Unload the gear they are going to need going to need.
